keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Designated as Primary CP9 Fighting Force
keyMoments.description: Paulie acknowledges that the Straw Hat Pirates are the only ones strong enough to fight CP9, designating them as the primary combat force while the Franky Family and Galley-La Company handle breaking through the gates.
keyMoments.significance: Official recognition of the Straw Hat Pirates' strength and their central role in the assault on Enies Lobby.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Charges Ahead Alone
keyMoments.description: Luffy abandons the coordinated plan and launches himself into Enies Lobby ahead of schedule, forcing the entire rescue operation to begin immediately.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's leadership style - impulsive and action-oriented rather than strategic - and forces all allied forces to adapt to his initiative.
